mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_service_order ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, finish_date, type, service_id, school_id, state, is_settle, is_deposit_user, subagency_id, is_pay, receive_type_id, receive_date, receivable, discount, received, payment_times, amount, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, user_id, mara_id, adviser_id, official_id, remarks, is_delete) VALUES ( now(), now(), NULL, #{type}, #{serviceId}, #{schoolId}, #{state}, #{isSettle}, #{isDepositUser}, #{subagencyId}, #{isPay}, #{receiveTypeId}, #{receiveDate}, #{receivable}, #{discount}, #{received}, #{paymentTimes}, #{amount}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{userId}, #{maraId}, #{adviserId}, #{officialId}, #{remarks}, 0);
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS GmtCreate, finish_date AS finishDate, type, service_id AS serviceId, school_id AS schoolId, state, is_settle AS isSettle, is_deposit_user AS isDepositUser, subagency_id AS subagencyId, is_pay AS isPay, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, receive_date AS receiveDate, receivable, discount, received, payment_times AS paymentTimes, amount, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, user_id AS userId, mara_id AS maraId, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, remarks FROM b_service_order WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
